doc_context:
path /v3/offchain/dogecoin/transfer
opid dogetransfer
params None
sum send doge from a virtual account to the blockchain
reqBody
oneof
props
senderaccountid
desc sender account id
maxlength 24
minlength 24
type string
address
desc blockchain address to send assets to for btc ltc doge and bch it is possible to enter list of multiple recipient blockchain addresses as a comma separated string
maxlength 10000
minlength 1
type string
amount
desc amount to be withdrawn to blockchain
maxlength 38
type string
pattern ddd
compliant
desc compliance check if withdrawal is not compliant it will not be processed
type boolean
fee
desc fee to be submitted as a transaction fee to blockchain if none is set default value of 1 doge is used
type string
pattern ddd
multipleamounts
desc for btc ltc doge and bch it is possible to enter list of multiple recipient blockchain amounts list of recipient addresses must be present in the address field and total sum of amounts must be equal to the amount field
type array
items
type string
pattern ddd
mnemonic
maxlength 500
minlength 1
desc mnemonic seed  usually 1224 words with access to whole wallet
either mnemonic keypair or signature id must be present  depends on the type of account and xpub
tatum kms does not support keypair type of offchain transaction only mnemonic based
type string
xpub
desc extended public key xpub of the wallet associated with the accounts should be present when mnemonic is used
maxlength 150
minlength 1
type string
paymentid
desc identifier of the payment shown for created transaction within tatum sender account
maxlength 100
minlength 1
type string
sendernote
desc note visible to owner of withdrawing account
maxlength 500
minlength 1
type string
required
amount
senderaccountid
address
mnemonic
xpub
type object
schName transferdogemnemonic
